body_html: e.cuda() modifies the actual embedding module (it's expensive to clone modules). idx.cuda() returns a new tensor, but idx stays on the CPU. Change it to idx = idx.cuda() and it will work fine.

body: `e.cuda()` modifies the actual embedding module (it's expensive to clone modules). `idx.cuda()` returns a new tensor, but `idx` stays on the CPU. Change it to `idx = idx.cuda()` and it will work fine.
